revised_title: Investigating the Similarities and Differences Between Voltaic and Ordinary Electricity
tldr: In this research, Michael Faraday explores the similarities and differences between voltaic and ordinary electricity. He demonstrates that both types of electricity exhibit attractions and repulsions, and produce magnetic phenomena, chemical decompositions, and physiological effects. Faraday also examines the electrical phenomena of magneto-electricity and compares them to those of voltaic electricity. He suggests that the power of chemical decomposition is directly proportional to the quantity of transmitted electricity.
